attributes.action: TAX CREDIT UNFAIRNESS to hard workers
attributes.additional_details:
Why are part time working women having a total income when wages supplemented by the state, receiving as much as & may be more than a full time worker. example
Earnings £9000/annum (monthly approx £722) receives TAX CREDIT of £1000 = £1722/month income.
Earnings £20000/annum (£1400/month)
 receives NO TAX CREDIT = £1400/month
How can this be right! ALSO what incentive is this giving to encourage the UK adult to work hard.
WRITE TO THE PRIME MINISTER'S OFFICE & YOUR LOCAL MP CALLING UPON GOVERNMENT TO LEGISLATE TO RECTIFY
